com.microsoft.windowsazure.management

Class ManagementCertificateOperationsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.ManagementCertificateOperationsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceOperations<ManagementClientImpl>, ManagementCertificateOperations

    public class ManagementCertificateOperationsImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceOperations<ManagementClientImpl>, ManagementCertificateOperations
    You can use management certificates, which are also known as subscription certificates, to authenticate clients attempting to connect to resources associated with your Azure subscription. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/jj154124.aspx for more information)
